## Introduction

This week will introduce how to group similar data points together to discover patterns and structures within a dataset.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Understand the principle and purpose of clustering analysis.
2. Understand K-Means and apply K-Means to various datasets.
3. Interpret the results of clustering analysis.
